Requirements You just used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.zJ3Jakto3oqJTLZR]{Limit Break} action.

Range [[5 * @actor.flags.pf2e.limit-rank]] feet; Target 1 creature

Duration [[1 * @actor.flags.pf2e.limit-rank]] rounds

Defense basic Fortitude

You swing your blade with conviction, knowing that the enemyâ€™s time has come. Make a melee Strike, treating the range of Judgement Blade as your weapon's reach for this Strike. If this Strike hits, you deal an additional 1d12 + 3 damage per Limit Rank, and the target must make a @Check[type:fortitude|against:limit-dc] saving throw.

Critical Success The target takes minimum damage, and the limit break ends.

Success The target talkes half damage and takes an additional @Damage[(1 * @actor.flags.pf2e.limit-rank)[force]] damage.

Failure The target takes full damage and takes an additional @Damage[(1 * @actor.flags.pf2e.limit-rank)d6[persistent,force]] damage.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage and takes an additional @Damage[(1 * @actor.flags.pf2e.limit-rank)d6[persistent,force]] damage. The target does not make a flat check to end this persistent damage until the end of the turn after their next turn.
